pages.text: Sterling is a steam powered ship carrying two large cannons. It emits a massive amount of smoke during it's travells, making it easy to spot.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/salvo)$(l)Burst Fire/$$(br)Sterling targets a $(l)line of 2 tiles, damaging both of them/$. This ability has $(l)4 Uses/$ and costs $(l)5 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/turn_ender)$(l)Smoke Screen/$$(br)Sterling emits so much smoke that $(l)upon being hit/$, opponents can't tell if their shot hit or not, $(l)ending their turn/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
